name: Watch The Road
subtitle: Distracted Driver Detection
description: Trained machine learning models to detect if a driver is distracted or not using CNN based algorithms like Resnet and Mobilenet. The final model is deployed to detect distracted drivers in real time using camera or video clip.

name: Predict Future Sales
subtitle: Forecasting sales using historic time-series data
description: Implemented 3 different Machine Learning models using LightGBM, LSTM and Prophet algorithms to predict total sales for various products sold by 60 shops using 3 years of thier historical time-series data, following an extensive data exploration and pre-processing.

name: Tweet Sentiment Analysis
subtitle: NLP Classification Problem
description: Scrape latest tweets from Twitter based on given topic or keyword and determine the sentiment expressed by the tweet as Positive, Negative or Netural.
